areaLabelDD: =IF refine_"where"_extraction "x","x",IF(Y4<>"",Y4,IF(OR refine_"where"_extraction "sea",V4="ice_free_sea"),"o",IF(OR refine_"where"_extraction "ice_sheet",V4="floating_ice_shelf",V4="grounded_ice_sheet",V4="land_ice"),"li",IF(OR refine_"where"_extraction "sea_ice",V4="sea_ice_melt_pond",V4="sea_ice_ridges"),"si",IF(OR refine_"where"_extraction "land",V4="natural_grasses",V4="pastures",V4="crops",V4="trees",V4="vegetation",V4="unfrozen_soil",V4="shrubs",V4="wetland",V4="sector"),"lnd",IF(OR refine_"where"_extraction "cloud",V4="convective_cloud",V4="stratiform_cloud",V4="snow"),"sp","not found")))))))
areaLabelDD (more refined): =IF refine_"where"_extraction "x","x",IF refine_"where"_extraction "air","air",IF refine_"where"_extraction "sea","sea",IF refine_"where"_extraction "land","lnd",IF refine_"where"_extraction "sea_ice","si",IF refine_"where"_extraction "ice_sheet","is",IF refine_"where"_extraction "ice_free_sea","ifs",IF refine_"where"_extraction "floating_ice_shelf","fis",IF refine_"where"_extraction "grounded_ice_sheet","gis",IF refine_"where"_extraction "land_ice","li",IF refine_"where"_extraction "sea_ice_melt_pond","simp",IF refine_"where"_extraction "sea_ice_ridges","sir",IF refine_"where"_extraction "natural_grasses","ng",IF refine_"where"_extraction "pastures","pst",IF refine_"where"_extraction "crops","crp",IF refine_"where"_extraction "trees","tree",IF refine_"where"_extraction "vegetation","veg",IF refine_"where"_extraction "unfrozen_soil","ufs",IF refine_"where"_extraction "shrubs","shb",IF refine_"where"_extraction "wetland","wl",IF refine_"where"_extraction "sector","lus",IF refine_"where"_extraction "cloud","cl",IF refine_"where"_extraction "convective_cloud","ccl",IF refine_"where"_extraction "stratiform_cloud","scl",IF refine_"where"_extraction "snow","sn","not found")))))))))))))))))))))))))
Secondary realm(s): =IF(OR(AND expand_secondary_a_and_o_to_ap,_ac,op,_and_oc "",AJ4=""),AND expand_secondary_a_and_o_to_ap,_ac,op,_and_oc "",AJ4 realmLabelDD ,AND user-assigned_additional_realms "",AI4 realmLabelDD ,AND expand_secondary_a_and_o_to_ap,_ac,op,_and_oc AF4,AJ4 realmLabelDD ),"",IF(OR expand_secondary_a_and_o_to_ap,_ac,op,_and_oc "",AI4 realmLabelDD ,AJ4,IF(OR user-assigned_additional_realms "",AJ4 realmLabelDD ,AI4,CONCATENATE expand_secondary_a_and_o_to_ap,_ac,op,_and_oc " ",AJ4))))
verticalLabelDD (secondary): =IF(OR verticalLabelDD_(preliminary) "l",AO4="rhon",AO4="z0100",AO4="z0p1",AO4="z01"),AO4,IF verticalLabelDD_(preliminary) "p",CONCATENATE("p",MID corrected_CMIP6_dimensions SEARCH("plev",AZ4)+4,SEARCH(" ",AZ4,SEARCH("plev",AZ4))-SEARCH("plev",AZ4)-4)),IF verticalLabelDD_(preliminary) "h",CONCATENATE("h",MID corrected_CMIP6_dimensions SEARCH("alt",AZ4)+3,SEARCH(" ",AZ4,SEARCH("alt",AZ4))-SEARCH("alt",AZ4)-3)),IF verticalLabelDD_(preliminary) "h0",CONCATENATE("h0",MID corrected_CMIP6_dimensions SEARCH("height",AZ4)+6,SEARCH("m",AZ4,SEARCH("height",AZ4))-SEARCH("height",AZ4)-6)),IF verticalLabelDD_(preliminary) "z0",CONCATENATE("z0",MID corrected_CMIP6_dimensions SEARCH("depth",AZ4)+5,SEARCH("m",AZ4,SEARCH("depth",AZ4))-SEARCH("depth",AZ4)-5)),IF verticalLabelDD_(preliminary) "p0",CONCATENATE("p0",RIGHT corrected_CMIP6_dimensions LEN corrected_CMIP6_dimensions -SEARCH(" p",AZ4)-1)),IF verticalLabelDD_(preliminary) "o0",CONCATENATE("z0",MID corrected_CMIP6_dimensions SEARCH("olayer",AZ4)+6,SEARCH("m",AZ4,SEARCH("olayer",AZ4))-SEARCH("olayer",AZ4)-6)),AO4)))))))
temporalLabelDD: =IF(OR(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: max",T4)),ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: min",T4))),"tstat", IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: sum",T4)),"tsum", IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time1",AZ4)),"tpt", IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time2",AZ4)),"tcla", IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time3",AZ4)),"tcld", IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time",AZ4)),"tavg", "ti"))))))
CMIP6 abbrev. Primary realm: =IF CMIP6_original_primary_realm "atmos","ap",IF CMIP6_original_primary_realm "ocean","op",IF CMIP6_original_primary_realm "land","ld",IF CMIP6_original_primary_realm "seaIce","si",IF CMIP6_original_primary_realm "landIce","li",IF(OR CMIP6_original_primary_realm "atmosChem",BR4="aerosol"),"ac",IF CMIP6_original_primary_realm "ocnBgchem","oc","???")))))))
CMIP6 abbrev. secondary realm: =IF CMIP6_original_secondary_realm "","",IF CMIP6_original_secondary_realm "atmos","ap",IF CMIP6_original_secondary_realm "ocean","op",IF CMIP6_original_secondary_realm "land","ld",IF CMIP6_original_secondary_realm "seaIce","si",IF CMIP6_original_secondary_realm "landIce","li",IF(OR CMIP6_original_secondary_realm "atmosChem",BS4="aerosol"),"ac",IF CMIP6_original_secondary_realm "ocnBgchem","oc","???"))))))))
original: domain from \"where\" directiv: =IF original:_refine_"where"_extraction "x","xx",IF(OR original:_refine_"where"_extraction "sea",CJ4="ice_free_sea"),"o",IF(OR original:_refine_"where"_extraction "ice_sheet",CJ4="floating_ice_shelf",CJ4="grounded_ice_sheet",CJ4="land_ice"),"li",IF(OR original:_refine_"where"_extraction "sea_ice",CJ4="sea_ice_melt_pond",CJ4="sea_ice_ridges"),"si",IF(OR original:_refine_"where"_extraction "land",CJ4="natural_grasses",CJ4="pastures",CJ4="crops",CJ4="trees",CJ4="vegetation",CJ4="unfrozen_soil",CJ4="shrubs",CJ4="sector"),"ld",IF(OR original:_refine_"where"_extraction "cloud",CJ4="convective_cloud",CJ4="stratiform_cloud"),"a",IF original:_refine_"where"_extraction "snow","sn","not found")))))))
expanded frequency: =IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "mon","monthly",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "day","daily",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "6hr","6-hourly",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "3hr","3-hourly",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "1hr","hourly",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "yr","annual",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "dec","decadal",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "multiyr","multi-year",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "subhr","sub-hourly",IF new_frequency_(intervalReportedDD) "fx","","XXXXX"))))))))))
temporal method: =IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: mean within days",T4))," climatology for each month",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: maximum within days",T4))," means of daily maximum",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: minimum within days",T4))," means of daily minimum",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: maximum (hourly rate",T4))," maximum hourly rate",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: max",T4))," maximum",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: min",T4))," minimum",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: mean within years time: mean over years",T4))," climatology",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: mean",T4))," time means",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: point",T4))," synoptic samples",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("time: sum",T4))," accumulations"," time-independent field"))))))))))
vertical coordinate information: =IF verticalLabelDD_(final).1 "z0","",IF(AND verticalLabelDD_(final).1 "l",CP4=" ")," provided on multiple model levels",IF verticalLabelDD_(final).1 "l"," provided on multiple model levels and",IF verticalLabelDD_(final).1 "rhon"," provided on multiple (potential) density surfaces and",IF verticalLabelDD_(final).1 "z00"," at the surface",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("z0p1",AV4))," integrated over the uppermost 10 cm and",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("sdepth10",AZ4))," integrated over the uppermost 100 cm and",IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("olayer",AZ4)),CONCATENATE(" integrated over the uppermost ",RIGHT verticalLabelDD_(final).1 LEN verticalLabelDD_(final).1 -2)," m and"),IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("z0",AV4)),CONCATENATE(" at a depth of ",RIGHT verticalLabelDD_(final).1 LEN verticalLabelDD_(final).1 -2)," m"),IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("z",AV4)),CONCATENATE(" requested at ",RIGHT verticalLabelDD_(final).1 LEN verticalLabelDD_(final).1 -1)," depths and"),IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("p0",AV4)),CONCATENATE(" at ",RIGHT verticalLabelDD_(final).1 LEN verticalLabelDD_(final).1 -2)," hPa"),IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("p",AV4)),CONCATENATE(" requested on ",RIGHT verticalLabelDD_(final).1 LEN verticalLabelDD_(final).1 -1)," pressure levels and"),IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("h0",AV4)),CONCATENATE(" at a height of (or near) ",RIGHT verticalLabelDD_(final).1 LEN verticalLabelDD_(final).1 -2)," m"),IF(ISNUMBER(SEARCH("h",AV4)),CONCATENATE(" requested at ",RIGHT verticalLabelDD_(final).1 LEN verticalLabelDD_(final).1 -1)," heights and"),"XXXX"))))))))))))))
horizontal coordinate information: =IF horizontalLabelDD "hxy"," reported on a 2-d spatial grid",IF horizontalLabelDD "hxys"," reported at assorted individual sites",IF horizontalLabelDD "hy"," reported as a function of latitude",IF horizontalLabelDD "hm","",IF horizontalLabelDD "hys"," reported as a function of latitude and ocean basin",IF horizontalLabelDD "ht"," characterizing transport across a 'line' (not necessarily coincident with a latitude circle)","XXXX"))))))
long_name: =IF(ISNUMBER(FIND("area-total over region",CX4)),IF cleaned_version_of_region "global",CONCATENATE("global total ",SUBSTITUTE preliminary_long_name " (area-total over region)","")),SUBSTITUTE preliminary_long_name "area-total over region",CONCATENATE cleaned_version_of_region " total"))),IF(ISNUMBER(FIND("area-mean over region",CX4)),IF cleaned_version_of_region "global",CONCATENATE("global mean ",SUBSTITUTE preliminary_long_name " (area-mean over region)","")),SUBSTITUTE preliminary_long_name "area-mean over region",CONCATENATE cleaned_version_of_region " area-mean"))),IF(CW4<>"global",SUBSTITUTE preliminary_long_name ":",CONCATENATE(" over ",CW4,":")),CX4)))
area type: =IF refine_"where"_extraction "x","x",IF refine_"where"_extraction "air","air",IF refine_"where"_extraction "sea","sea",IF refine_"where"_extraction "land","land",IF refine_"where"_extraction "sea_ice","sea_ice",IF refine_"where"_extraction "ice_sheet","ice_sheet","other"))))))
Unnamed: 201: =IF Unnamed:_197 "x","x",IF(GS4<>"",GS4,IF(OR Unnamed:_197 "sea",GP4="ice_free_sea"),"o",IF(OR Unnamed:_197 "ice_sheet",GP4="floating_ice_shelf",GP4="grounded_ice_sheet",GP4="land_ice"),"li",IF(OR Unnamed:_197 "sea_ice",GP4="sea_ice_melt_pond",GP4="sea_ice_ridges"),"si",IF(OR Unnamed:_197 "land",GP4="natural_grasses",GP4="pastures",GP4="crops",GP4="trees",GP4="vegetation",GP4="unfrozen_soil",GP4="shrubs",GP4="wetland",GP4="sector"),"ld",IF(OR Unnamed:_197 "cloud",GP4="convective_cloud",GP4="stratiform_cloud",GP4="snow"),"sp","not found")))))))
Modify dimensions. No need for special: =IF(OR( Notes/Questions_category "xant", Notes/Questions_category_(secondary) "xant", Notes/Questions_category_(tertiary) "xant"), "Modify dimensions.  No need for special horizontal coordinates.", "")
Modify dimensions. Add or remove scalar: =IF(OR( Notes/Questions_category "scalar", Notes/Questions_category_(secondary) "scalar", Notes/Questions_category_(tertiary) "scalar"), "Modify dimensions.  Add or remove scalar coordinate.", "")
Depricate? Eliminate one of \"point\" or: =IF(OR( Notes/Questions_category "dupFrq", Notes/Questions_category_(secondary) "dupFrq", Notes/Questions_category_(tertiary) "dupFrq"),"Deprecate? Eliminate one of 'point' or 'mean' variable options.", "")
Depricate? Few institutions contributed: =IF($M4<4,CONCATENATE("Deprecate? Only ", #_institutions_reporting_per_out_name " groups contributed this variable in CMIP6."),"")
Modify cell methods. Include \"where ai: =IF(OR( Notes/Questions_category "air", Notes/Questions_category_(secondary) "air", Notes/Questions_category_(tertiary) "air"),"Modify cell methods.  Include 'where air'.", "")
Modify cell methods. Include \"where se: =IF(OR( Notes/Questions_category "sea", Notes/Questions_category_(secondary) "sea", Notes/Questions_category_(tertiary) "sea"),"Modify cell methods.  Include 'where sea'.", "")
